name: Warehouse Simulator 2021
description:
WHAT IS WAREHOUSE SIMULATOR 2021

Wearhouse Simulator 2021 was made in the epic megajam 2021 and this game was made in 7 days by one person. it uses quixel assets for the map and sounds from dynamedion. 

WHAT DO YOU DO IN WAREHOUSE SIMULATOR 2021

In Warehouse Simulator 2021 you play the character of jimmy, jimmy is a new intern who is working at the warehouse, however you have a very strict supervisor who isent going to let you be slacking on the job and and failing to do your work such as filling up the trucks or keeping your conveyor belt empty. 

 Also watch out for forklifts.

 

This game was made for the megajam 2021

Discord: https://discord.gg/Kkz5Ayhz57

Website: https://gigatechstudios.com/
